name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zero Two Dance Live Wallpaper Animations

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Zero Two’s dance to your browser! Download now for lively wallpapers and a fun anime-inspired new tab experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of Darling in the Franxx with the Zero Two Dance Live Wallpaper extension! Each new tab bursts with energy, featuring dynamic, high-quality animations of Zero Two’s famous dance scene, perfect for fans of her bold personality and the anime’s vibrant aesthetic.

Key Features:
Animated Dance Wallpaper: Relive Zero Two’s iconic dance with captivating, high-resolution live wallpapers.
Clock & Date Display: Keep track of your day with a stylish, anime-themed clock and date layout.
Quick Access Links: Access your favorite sites effortlessly with intuitive shortcuts.
Additional Options: Explore more extensions, read the privacy policy, or uninstall with a simple click.
Designed for fans of Zero Two and Darling in the Franxx, this extension transforms your browser into a lively, anime-inspired space.

Download now and let Zero Two’s dance brighten every new tab you open!
